casebody.data:
Daryl E. MERRIWETHER, Petitioner
v.
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent No. 75 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 18, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
